headline: Why Jefferies Sees More Upside Ahead for AppLovin (APP) Stock
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the AI Stocks Gaining Attention on Wall Street. On September 4, Jefferies analyst James Heaney raised the price target on the stock to $615.00 (from $560.00) while maintaining a Buy rating. The price target raise follows meeting with AppLovin’s CEO/CFO. Mutiple growth drivers behind an expected fourth-quarter e-commerce advertising inflection […]

headline: Video Games ETF (NERD) Hits New 52-Week High
summary: NERD surged to a new 52-week high, thanks to a sharp jump in AppLovin shares and strong momentum in the gaming sector.

headline: S&P Futures Tick Higher Ahead of U.S. Payrolls Revisions
summary: September S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESU25) are trending up +0.17% this morning, buoyed by hopes for multiple interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve this year, while investors await an annual review of U.S. jobs data.
